div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2264 Orrestano (Oristano; anc. Othoca), (774) 100 km. NNW of Cagliari Sardinia, 1925? Burial: c. 310 B.C. Contents: 110+ EL, AV Carthage: st. (Carthage mint) ANS 1944.100.79616 ANS 1967.152.689 ANS 1944.100.79609 Disposition: London 17; New York 3; Lewis 3 Jenkins-Lewis, Carthage, p. 56, hoard III, pp. 78-94, illus. Note in ANS
